issues.description:
Function close() retrieves the transaction origin (tx.origin) using the ORIGIN opcode. Use msg.sender instead.
See also: https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/develop/security-considerations.html#tx-origin
issues.title: Use of tx.origin
